items.name: SERVER IDENTIFICATION TAG
items.comment: Identification of the Server of track information.

items.name: USER NUMBER
items.comment: Identification of the User of track information

items.name: TIME OF MESSAGE
items.comment: Absolute time stamping of the message in the form of elapsed time since last midnight

items.name: SERVICE IDENTIFICATION
items.comment: Identification of the service(s) to which a track message belongs.

items.name: BS
items.comment: 1 Track selected by the Background service

items.name: C1
items.comment: 1 Track selected by the Complementary service 1

items.name: C2
items.comment: 1 Track selected by the Complementary service 2

items.name: C3
items.comment: 1 Track selected by the Complementary service 3

items.name: C4
items.comment: 1 Track selected by the Complementary service 4

items.name: C5
items.comment: 1 Track selected by the Complementary service 5

items.name: TYPE OF MESSAGE
items.comment: This data item allows for a more convenient handling of the message at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

items.name: FAMILY
items.comment: FAMILY to which the message belongs

items.name: NATURE
items.comment: NATURE of the message within its FAMILY

items.name: TRACK NUMBER
items.comment: Identification of a track

items.name: sttn
items.comment: track numbering indicator, value is changed when the track numbering is restarted.

items.name: ARTAS TRACK NUMBER
items.comment: Identification of an ARTAS track

items.name: SYSTEM TRACK NUMBER IN UNIT a
SYSTEM TRACK NUMBER IN UNIT b
SYSTEM TRACK NUMBER IN UNIT c
SYSTEM TRACK NUMBER IN UNIT d
SYSTEM TRACK NUMBER IN UNIT e
SYSTEM TRACK NUMBER IN UNIT f
TRACK MODE 3/A
items.comment: Mode 3/A identity associated to the track

items.name: V
items.comment:
0 Code validated
1 Code not validated

items.name: G
items.comment:
0 Default
1 Garbled Code

items.name: C
items.comment:
Change in Mode 3/A
0 No Change
1 Mode 3/A has changed

items.name: TIME OF LAST UPDATE
items.comment: Absolute time stamping of the information provided in the track message, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight.

items.name: ARTAS TRACK STATUS
items.comment: Status of an ARTAS track.

items.name: LIV
items.comment:
0 Live target
1 Simulated or test target track

items.name: CNF
items.comment:
0 Confirmed track
1 Tentative track

items.name: ADD
items.comment:
0 track not updated using Aircraft Derived Data
1 track updated using Aircraft Derived Data

items.name: CST
items.comment:
0 non-coasted track
1 coasted track

items.name: TYPE
items.comment:
000 both PR and SSR Multiradar track
001 PR only Multiradar track
010 SSR only Multiradar track
011 not used
100 combined (P+S) monoradar track
101 PR monoradar track
110 SSR monoradar track
111 not used

items.name: TRM
items.comment:
0 default value
1 track TERMINATED

items.name: CRE
items.comment:
0 default value
1 track CREATED

items.name: SLR
items.comment:
0 slant range corrected track coordinates using tracked MODE C information.
1 slant range corrected track coordinates using triangulated track height or height derived from coverage
2 slant range correction using assumed height
3 non slant range corrected track coordinates

items.name: COR
items.comment:
000 confirmed flight plan to track correlation
001 type 1 correlation
010 type 2 correlation
011 type 3 correlation
100 type 4 correlation
101 type 5 correlation
110 type 6 correlation
111 track not correlated to a flight plan

items.name: FOR
items.comment:
0 default
1 Formation flight

items.name: AMA
items.comment:
0 amalgamated track
1 non amalgamated track

items.name: SPI
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Special Position Indication in the last SSR plot that was used to update the track

items.name: ME
items.comment:
0 default value
1 Military Emergency

items.name: TDC
items.comment:
0 Accurate estimation of the track Transponder Delay enabling correction of the plots associated to the track
1 Estimation of the track Transponder Delay not accurate enough to enable the plots correction

items.name: SF
items.comment:
0 Track position coding precision (1/64 NM)
1 Track position coding precision = 1/32 NM

items.name: ARTAS TRACK QUALITY
items.comment: ARTAS track quality.

items.name: Quality
items.comment: ARTAS track quality = 0 (low quality) to 7 (high quality)

items.name: CALCULATED TRACK POSITION (CARTESIAN)
items.comment: Calculated position of an aircraft expressed in Cartesian coordinates.

data_fields.name: X-Component
data_fields.comment: unit: NM, NOTE: LSB is set considering f=0 (I252/340)

data_fields.name: Y-Component
data_fields.comment: unit: NM, NOTE: LSB is set considering f=0 (I252/340)

items.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF TRACK POSITION (CARTESIAN)
items.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of an aircraft expressed in Cartesian coordinates.

data_fields.name: X-Component accuracy
data_fields.comment: unit: NM, NOTE: LSB is set considering f=0 (I252/340)

data_fields.name: Y-Component accuracy
data_fields.comment: unit: NM, NOTE: LSB is set considering f=0 (I252/340)

items.name: TRACK MODE 2 CODE
items.comment: Mode 2 identification associated to the track

items.name: V
items.comment:
0 Code validated
1 Code not validated

items.name: G
items.comment:
0 Default
1 Garbled Code

items.name: C
items.comment:
Change in Mode 2
0 No Change
1 Mode 2 has changed

items.name: CALCULATED TRACK ALTITUDE
items.comment: Calculated altitude of an aircraft.

items.name: SRC
items.comment:
0 3D height
1 Triangulated height
2 Height derived from coverage
3 Assumed height

items.name: ALTITUDE
items.comment: calculated track altitude. unit: feet

items.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF TRACK ALTITUDE
items.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated altitude of an aircraft.

items.name: LAST MEASURED MODE C
items.comment: Mode C code of the last nearest neighbour plot containing a Mode C and used to update the track.

items.name: VAL
items.comment:
0 valid Mode C code
1 invalid Mode C code

items.name: GC
items.comment:
0 default value
1 garbled information

items.name: MODE C
items.comment: Vmin = -12 FL = -1200 ft; Vmax = 1270 FL = 127000 ft

items.name: MEASURED TRACK MODE C
items.comment: Last validated and credible Mode C value used to update the track.

items.name: MODE C
items.comment: Vmin = -12 FL = -1200 ft; Vmax = 1270 FL = 127000 ft

items.name: CALCULATED TRACK FLIGHT LEVEL
items.comment: Calculated Flight Level of the track (isobar).

items.name: QNC
items.comment:
0 FL calculated without QNH correction
1 FL calculated with QNH correction

items.name: TRACK FLIGHT LEVEL
items.comment: Vmin = -15 FL = -1500 ft; Vmax = 15000 FL = 150000 ft

items.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF CALCULATED TRACK FLIGHT LEVEL
items.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated Flight Level of the track (isobar).

items.name: TRACK AGES
items.comment: A set of track related ages.

data_fields.name: PSR
data_fields.comment: Age of the last primary plot/local track used to update the track. maximum value = 63.75 s

data_fields.name: SSR
data_fields.comment: Age of the last secondary plot/local track used to update the track. maximum value = 63.75 s

data_fields.name: AMODE
data_fields.comment: Age of the last detection of the mode A contained in the track mode A item I030/060. maximum value = 63.75 s

data_fields.name: CMODE
data_fields.comment: Age of the last valid and credible mode C used to update the track, contained in I030/150. maximum value = 63.75 s

items.name: CALCULATED TRACK VELOCITY (POLAR)
items.comment: Calculated track velocity expressed in polar coordinates.

items.name: CALCULATED TRACK VELOCITY (CARTESIAN)
items.comment: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian coordinates.

items.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF TRACK VELOCITY (CARTESIAN)
items.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian coordinates.

items.name: MODE OF FLIGHT
items.comment: Calculated Mode-of-Flight of an aircraft.

items.name: TRANS
items.comment:
Transversal Acceleration :
0 Constant Course
1 Right Turn
2 Left Turn
3 Undetermined

items.name: LONGI
items.comment:
Longitudinal Acceleration :
0 Constant Groundspeed
1 Increasing Groundspeed
2 Decreasing Groundspeed
3 Undetermined

items.name: VERTI
items.comment:
Vertical Rate :
0 Level
1 Climb
2 Descent
3 Undetermined

items.name: MODE OF FLIGHT PROBABILITIES
items.comment: Probabilities attached to the Transversal, longitudinal and Vertical components of a calculated Mode-of-Flight.

data_fields.name: TCPROB
data_fields.comment: probability associated to the assessment of the Transversal Acceleration Mode-of-Flight Component

data_fields.name: LCPROB
data_fields.comment: probability associated to the assessment of the Longitudinal Acceleration Mode-of-Flight Component

data_fields.name: VCPROB
data_fields.comment: probability associated to the assessment of the Vertical Acceleration Mode-of-Flight Component

items.name: CALCULATED RATE OF CLIMB/DESCENT
items.comment: Calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft.

items.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF RATE OF CLIMB/DESCENT
items.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft

items.name: CALCULATED RATE OF TURN
items.comment: Calculated Rate of Turn expressed in degrees per second.

items.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF RATE OF TURN
items.comment: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of a calculated Rate of Turn expressed in degrees per second

data_fields.name: ESTIMATED ACCURACY OF RATE OF TURN

items.name: RADAR IDENTIFICATION TAG
items.comment: Identification of the radar station from which has been received the last plot/local track used to update an ARTAS track.

items.name: LOCAL TRACK NUMBER
items.comment: The local track number is an integer value representing a unique reference to a track record within a particular track file e.g. the track data-base of a radar local tracker.

items.name: PLOT AGES
items.comment: A set of plot related ages.

data_fields.name: AMODE
data_fields.comment: Age of the last mode A used to update the track and contained in item I030/340. maximum value = 63.75 s

data_fields.name: CMODE
data_fields.comment: Age of the last mode C used to update the track and contained in I030/140. maximum value = 63.75 s

items.name: LAST MEASURED MODE 3/A
items.comment: Mode 3/A of the last nearest neighbour plot containing a mode 3/A and used to update the track.

items.name: V
items.comment:
0 Code validated
1 Code not validated

items.name: G
items.comment:
0 Default
1 Garbled Code

items.name: L
items.comment:
0 MODE 3/A code as derived from the reply of the transponder
1 Smoothed MODE 3/A code as provided by a local tracker

items.name: MEASURED POSITION
items.comment: Measured position of an aircraft in local polar coordinates (information provided in the last plot/local track used to update an ARTAS track).

items.name: MEASURED 3-D HEIGHT
items.comment: Height of an aircraft measured by a 3-D Radar (Information provided in the last plot/local track used to update an ARTAS track).

items.name: AIRCRAFT ADDRESS
items.comment: technical Mode-S address used for identification of an aircraft

items.name: AIRCRAFT IDENTIFICATION
items.comment: Aircraft Identification (in 8 characters) obtained from an aircraft equipped with a Mode S transponder.

items.name: COMMUNICATIONS CAPABILITY AND FLIGHT STATUS
items.comment: Communications capability of the transponder and flight status.

items.name: COM
items.comment:
0 no communications capability (surveillance only)
1 Comm. A and Comm. B capability
2 Comm. A, Comm. B and Uplink ELM
3 Comm. A, Comm. B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
4 Level 5 Transponder capability.
5/7 not assigned

items.name: STAT
items.comment:
0 no alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
1 no alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
2 alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
3 alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
4 alert, SPI, aircraft on ground or airborne
5 no alert, SPI, aircraft on ground or airborne
6/7 not assigned

items.name: FPPS IDENTIFICATION TAG
items.comment: Identification of the Flight Plan Data Processing System from which Flight-Plan related information are preferred by the User.

items.name: CALLSIGN
items.comment: Callsign (in 7 characters) of an aircraft (provided in the Miniplan).

items.name: PLN NUMBER
items.comment: The PLN NUMBER is an integer value representing a unique reference to a Flight-plan record within a particular FPPS (Information provided in the miniplan).

items.name: FLIGHT CATEGORY
items.comment: Flight Category (information provided in the Miniplan).

items.name: GAT/OAT
items.comment:
0 Unknown
1 General Air Traffic
2 Operational Air Traffic
3 Not applicable

items.name: FR1/FR2
items.comment:
0 Instrument Flight Rules
1 Visual Flight Rules
2 Not applicable
3 Controlled Visual Flight Rules

items.name: SP3/SP2/SP1
items.comment: These three bits allow for the definition of up to 7 sub-categories within the main categories.

items.name: TYPE OF AIRCRAFT
items.comment: Type of Aircraft indicated in a Miniplan.

items.name: CATEGORY OF TURBULENCE
items.comment: Category of turbulence of an aircraft (information provided in the Miniplan).

data_fields.name: TURBULENCE CATEGORY
data_fields.comment:
1001100 = L : Light
1001101 = M : Medium
1001000 = H : Heavy
1001010 = J : Super

items.name: DEPARTURE AIRPORT
items.comment: Departure Airport indicated in a Miniplan.

items.name: DESTINATION AIRPORT
items.comment: Destination Airport indicated in a Miniplan.

items.name: ALLOCATED SSR CODES
items.comment: List of successive SSR codes allocated to a flight (Information provided in the miniplan).

items.name: CURRENT CLEARED FLIGHT LEVEL
items.comment: Current Cleared Flight Level of an aircraft, provided by a FPPS.

items.name: CURRENT CONTROL POSITION
items.comment: Identification of the Current Control Position in charge of an aircraft, as provided by a FPPS.
